alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 13 at 12:17PM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Extreme cold expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Polson, Flathead Lake, Polebridge, Highway 56 Bull Lake Road, Essex, Highway 37 Eureka to Libby, Highway 2 Kalispell to Libby, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake, Highway 93 Eureka to Whitefish, Marias Pass, Flathead Valley, Mission Valley, and Bad Rock Canyon. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region
